overview: Rebeca lives isolated with her parents on a chicken farm. She loves animals but she can't handle the situation at home anymore: Her emotionally and psychologically unstable mother suffers outbreaks in which she is unable to control her aggressiveness. The day that she decides to run away, Rebeca will realize that she no longer needs her father to leave and that, in reality, he never had any intention of letting her go.
title: Domestic Fowls
